Description: Red pottery ostracon, from the body of a convex vessel, interior grooved and exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with remains of thirteen lines of black-painted demotic text on the exterior and further line on the interior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (52394) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/52394)
Kaplony-Heckel 1963a / Die demotischen Tempeleide I: Text (p. 385) (description)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
